text: Unn ki qom mein jo mutakabbir sardar thay unhon ney gharib logon say jo kay inn mein say eman ley aaye thay poocha kiya tum ko iss baat ka yaqeen hai kay saleh (alh-e-salam) apney rab ki taraf say bhejay huye hain? Unhon ney kaha kay be-shak hum to iss per poora yaqeen rakhtay hain jo inn ko dey ker bheja gaya hai
